summary: Boost Dawnguard reward items to roughly Daedric quality, add the missing helm, make items upgrade-able.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Better Dawnguard Rewards
Version: 1.2
Date: 08/25/2012
Author: LF
Requires:
Dawnguard

1.1
Initial Release

1.2
ESP name change
Recompressed
Decreased armor values of almost everything except auriel shield. 

Details:
Boost Dawnguard reward items to roughly Daedric quality, add the missing helm, make items upgradeable.
I finished Dawnguard, and in the end none of the items I worked so hard to get were better than items already in my inventory. I feel this is a recurring design issue with Bethesda products which may be intentional. The risk  vs. reward balance is not justifiable. In this case the rewards given to the player to not justify the larger risk taken to acquire them. The aim of this mod is to fix the risk/reward balance issues in Dawnguard. 
There are a few mods on the nexus that already address this issue. These mods were good, but I wanted one mod to fix all of the final reward items for the various quests.  

Armor affected (updated 1.2): 
Auriel shield: Daedric armor value +1
Aetherial Crown: Dragon plate-ish armor value(21), upgradeable, Light armor (crown not a full helm = light weight). 
Aetherial Shield: Daedric Shield armor value(36), Upgradeable, Heavy armor. 
Dawnguard Rune Shield: Daedric Armor Value -1 (35)
Ivory crown: Dragon scale armor value, light armor,  Added to Vyrthur’s inventory (playable!). 
Ivory Armor (boots, gloves, chest): Matching Dragon Scale armor values.  

Weapons Affected:
Aetherial Staff: Doubled charges. 
Auriel Bow: Daedric Bow Damage +1 (20), Speed 1.1 (0.1 Faster than Zephyr), Blood and bless arrows upgraded to Daedric damage. Bow enchantment has infinite charges (same as Better Auriel’s bow mod by popcorn71)
Dwarven enhanced crossbow: damage 25 (+3 to the vanilla stat)
Harkon sword: Daedric damage 19
Rune Axe: Daedric Axe Damage 18
Rune Hammer: Daedric hammer damage 27
Zephyr: Daedric Bow Damage -1 (18), Speed unchanged (1.0) 

Install:
1.	Extract \'Dawnguard Rewards.esp\' into you Skyrim data folder.
2.	Start the Skyrim Launcher and place a check mark next to \'Dawnguard Rewards.esp\'.
3.	Play Skyrim.

Uninstall:
Delete \'Dawnguard Rewards.esp\' from your data folder.

Recommended Mods: 
Auriels Shield Retextured by Ortiz
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22493

Thanks: 
I started working on this after using:
Better Auriels Bow by popcorn71
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22324
and

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21696
